name: Moonleap
description:
Moonleap is a game about a moon boy on his journey to recover shooting stars. Change day to night with your jump and catch all the stars in this short and challenging puzzle-platformer!

  • Challenging puzzles;
  • 50 handmade levels;
  • Secret and optional levels;
  • Beautiful pixel-art graphics;
  • A cute moon.

An innovative mechanic with simple and accessible controls, walk and jump! 🌜✨
